articles.title: India pledges support for US bid to tap oil reserves - Times of India
articles.description: India Business News: NEW DELHI: India on Saturday pledged support to a US bid for co-ordinated release of strategic oil reserves to cool prices, even as New Delhi said it .
articles.content: India pledges support for US bid to tap oil reserves
